name: Bunny Catching
description:
Submission for the Leeble Game Jam 6.

The bunnies have escaped again, and it's up to you, the BunnyCatcher6000, to catch them and bring them home again.

Features quick arcade-style gameplay and  multiple types of randomly generated levels, as well as lots of bunnies.

Beware bugs, as I've never really made a game before and I'm sure I missed quite a few. Leave a comment and I will go and try to fix it.
